Arguably one of the best game series of all time.

There are very few games on this planet that I can guarantee deserve a perfect 10/10 score. 'Portal 2' is one of those lucky few. When people ask me what I want in a puzzle game, I will always point to this game and the original 'Portal' as the peak, and with good reason. Both games are immersive, engaging, challenging, and have some of the best writing and voice acting you could ever find in a video game, even by today's standards. The graphics have hardly dated and the game play still holds up even by the standards of the new-era First Person Shooter/Puzzle genre. It's a shame we didn't get a Virtual Reality 'Portal' game first, but I'm more than happy to replay these games time and time again until such a game's hypothetical release.
